hanzi-su-wiki:
潜

Значения

Прятаться; прятать; пролезать, проходить под, нырять; заползать

Мнемоника

Менять 替 воздушную среду обитания на воду 氵, скрываться под водой.

Варианты

潛, 濳
purpleculture_pinyin:
qián
hidden; secret; latent; to hide; to conceal; to submerge; to dive
скрытый; секрет; скрытый; прятаться; скрыть; погрузиться в воду; нырять
rtega_mnemonic:
潛潛RS
潜潜		濳hide, hidden, secret, latent, submerge, dive
  • two men under the sun 朁/替/㬱 lost in the water 氵: they are hidden or submerged or diving
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 潛)
Antonyms: 浮
Pictophonetic: 替 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
潜力 [ qián lì ]: potential; capacity
潜在 [ qián zài ]: hidden; potential; latent
潜艇 [ qián tǐng ]: submarine
潜心 [ qián xīn ]: to concentrate fully on sth; single-minded
潜能 [ qián néng ]: potential; hidden capability
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 替 [ tì ] to change, to replace, to substitute for
heisig_chinese_memo: When a submarine or similar vessels submerges an exchange of air for water takes place, just like an exchange of husbands for a day like on those reality TV shows.
heisig_constituent: submerge, water, water droplets, water pistol, exchange, husband, sun, day, tongue wagging, husband2
koohiiStory1: When a submarine or similar vessel SUBMERGES an EXCHANGE of air for WATER takes place in special compartments.
koohiiStory2: The two husbands exchange for a day on the reality TV show (see exchange (#842)) finally goes underway. One of the two husband´s first job is to fix the water faucet in his new family´s apartment. Unfortunately, he isn´t very good at fixing things and after a few failed attempts the entire apartment is submerged in water.
kunYomi: ひそ.む、もぐ.る、かく.れる、くぐ.る、ひそ.める
jp_example_words:
潜る(くぐる): to drive, to pass through, to evade, to hide, to dive (into or under water), to go underground
潜水(せんすい): diving
潜入(せんにゅう): infiltration, sneaking in
潜る(もぐる): drive, pass through, evade, hide, dive (into or under water), go underground
jp_readingExamples: 潜む (ひそ.む), 潜る (もぐ.る)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tsunami carries a husband and his husband up into the sun where they conceal their centaur. The two husbands run a centaur farm, but the local government isn’t too pleased by this so they have to conceal their centaurs in the sun unless they want them to be confiscated by the government.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine the tsunami carrying the husbands and the centaur up into the sun. Hear the water gushing as they conceal the centaur up there. That tsunami is gigantic.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: What is it the husbands are going to conceal? Oh that’s right, a centaur (せん). They are concealing a centaur in the sun. How forgetful of you.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Just make sure to remember there is a centaur up on that tsunami with the husbands. They need to conceal the centaur to keep it safe.
Ru_Radicals: 人 (человек), 土 (земля), 汁 (суп), 日 (день)
Ru_trainchinese:
qián: (глаг) погружаться под воду, нырять
qián: (графема) скрытый, потенциальный; скрывать, прятать; скрытно, тайком
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you replace (替) the water (氵) (with yourself) when you lie hidden in it
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When a submarine or similar vessels submerges an exchange of air for water takes place, just like a day exchange of husbands and wives, and the two wives are two waitresses to make it funnier like on those reality TV shows.

Pinyin: qián
English Definition: hidden; secret; latent; to hide; to conceal; to submerge; to dive
Antonyms: 浮

Pictophonetic: 替 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.

    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 替 [ tì ] to change, to replace, to substitute for

潜字的基本解释

潜
qián
隐在水面下活动：潜水。潜泳。潜坝。潜行（ａ．在水面以下行动；ｂ．在外边秘密行动）。
隐藏的，秘密地：潜藏。潜伏。潜遁。潜逃。潜力。潜心。潜师。潜在。潜台词。潜移默化。
姓。

潜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qián］
［《廣韻》昨鹽切，平鹽，從。］
［《廣韻》慈豔切，去豔，從。］
“漸3”的被通假字。亦作“濳1”。亦作“潜1”。
(1)涉水；没水游渡。
(2)隐藏；隐蔽。
(3)秘密；暗中。
(4)暗流。
(5)深；沉。
(6)深处。
(7)测；探测。
(8)专一。
(9)见“潛潛”。
(10)通“糝”、“橬”、“罧”。鱼止息处。
(11)水名。汉水支流，即今湖北省潜江县东南部的芦洑河。
(12)水名。嘉陵江支流，即今四川省的渠江。
(13)水名。源出安徽省岳西县西北，南流至潜山县入皖河。
(14)春秋时鲁地名。当在今山东省济宁市西南喻屯一带。
(15)春秋时楚邑名。在今安徽省霍山县东北。
(16)姓。宋有潜说友。见宋周密《癸辛杂识别集·潜说友》。

潜字的英文翻译

◎ 潜
hidden, latent, secretly

潜字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潜； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页649第10
【字彙】俗潛字。

（潛）【唐韻】昨鹽切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】慈鹽切，?音?。【說文】涉水也。【揚子·方言】潛涵，沉也。又游也。【註】潛行水中，亦曰游。　又藏也。【易·乾卦】陽氣潛藏。　又【爾雅·釋言】潛，深也。【詩·小雅】潛雖伏矣。　又漢水之別名。【爾雅·釋水】水自江出爲沱，漢爲潛。【書·禹貢】沱潛旣道。　又丘名。【爾雅·釋丘】晉有潛丘。　又地名。【春秋·隱二年】公會戎于潛。　又邑名。【史記·楚世家】吳取楚之六潛。　又潛江，縣名。【廣輿記】屬安陸府。　又牛名。【酉陽雜俎】句漏縣大江中有潛牛。　又姓。宋安撫使潛說友。　又【小爾雅】魚之所息謂之潛。【詩·周頌】潛有多魚。【傳】潛，糝也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?慈艷切，音?。義同。一曰伏流。
潜字的源字形

潜字的起名意思

：隐在水面下活动，隐藏的，秘密地，深，沉。

latent
Basic explanation of words
latent
qián
Hidden underwater activities: diving. Snorkeling. Submerged dam. Sneak (a. Act below the surface of the water; b. Act secretly outside).
Hidden, secretly: hidden. Lurking. Sneak away. abscond. potential. Concentrate. Potential teacher. potential. Subtext. Imperceptibly.
name.
latent
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qián］
["Guangyun" salt cut yesterday, flat salt, from. ]
["Guangyun" Ci Yan cut, go to Yan, from. ]
"Gradually 3" was passed falsely. Also known as "Yi 1". Also known as "Qian 1".
(1) Wading; swimming without water.
(2) Hidden; concealed.
(3) Secret; secretly.
(4) Undercurrent.
(5) Deep; heavy.
(6) Deep.
(7) Measurement; detection.
(8) Single-mindedness.
(9) See "Qianqian".
(10) Through "炁", "橬", "罧". Where the fish stops.
(11) The name of the water. A tributary of the Han River, which is now the Luwei River in the southeast of Qianjiang County, Hubei Province.
(12) The name of the water. A tributary of the Jialing River, which is now the Qujiang River in Sichuan Province.
(13) The name of the water. It originates from the northwest of Yuexi County in Anhui Province and flows south to Qianshan County and enters the Wanhe River.
(14) Lu place names in the Spring and Autumn Period. It was in the Yutun area, southwest of Jining City, Shandong Province.
(15) The name of Chuyi in the Spring and Autumn Period. In today's northeast of Huoshan County, Anhui Province.
(16) Last name. Song Youqian said friends. See Song Zhoumi's "The Recognition Collection of Gui Xin Za · Qian Shuo You".
latent
English translation of words
◎ Diving
hidden, latent, secretly
latent
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　qian; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 649 No. 10
【Vocabulary】vulgar unspoken words. (Diving) [Tang Yun] Salt cut yesterday [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Kindly cut with salt, "yin?". [Said the text] Wading also. [Yangtze Dialect] Hidden connotation, Shen Ye. Swim again. [Note] Diving in the water is also called swimming.　Hidden again. [Yi·Qian Gua] Yang Qi is hidden.　[Erya·Interpretation] Dive, deep. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Although it is hidden.　Also the alias of Hanshui. 【Erya·Shishui】Water comes from the river as tuo, and the Han as submerged. [Book·Yugong] Tuo Qiangdao.　Also the name of the hill. [Erya Shiqiu] Qianqiu is promoted.　Also place name. [Spring and Autumn·Hidden Years] Guild Rong Yuqian.　Also known as the town. 【Historical Records·Chu Family】Wu takes the six potentials of Chu.　 Qianjiang again, the name of the county. [Guang Yu Ji] belongs to Anlu Mansion.　Also name. 【Youyang Miscellaneous】There are potential cows in the rivers of Juleu County.　Another last name. Song Anfu makes Qian talk to friends.　[Xiao Erya] The rest of the fish is called potential. [Poetry·Song of Zhou] There are many fishes hidden. [Biography] Qiang, grits too.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ci Yan cut, sound?. The same meaning. One said Fuliu.
latent
Source glyph
latent
Name meaning
: Hidden under the water, hidden, secretly, deep, deep.
潜
形声字。水(1)表意,篆书形体像水流,表示潜是没于水中的活动;警(qian)表声。潜本是潛的俗体,今以潜为正体。
本义是隐在水下。
①没在水面下活动:~水|~泳|~般艇。②隐藏:~伏」
~力」~移默化。③秘密地:一逃」~行。
qián
~藏 ~流 ~热 ~人 ~心 ~在~踪 沉~
替
潜
...
скрытый
Пиктофонетические символы.
Вода (1) означает, что сценарий тюленя подобен потоку воды, что указывает на то, что ныряние - это деятельность, погруженная в воду; звук полиции (цянь).
Скрытое - это вековая форма скрытого, а теперь скрытое - это положительная форма.
Первоначальный смысл скрыт под водой.
①Нет активности под водой: ~ Вода | ~ Плавание | ~ Лодка.
②Скрыто: ~ Громкость "~ Мощность" ~ сразу.
③Секретно: побег "~ ОК.
~ Скрытый ~ Поток ~ Тепло ~ Люди ~ Сердце ~ В ~ Отслеживание Шена ~
для
скрытый
qián
I гл.
1) ходить (передвигаться) под водой; нырять; течь под землёй
水潜陆行 ходить под водой и идти по суше
2) ускользать, убегать; уходить тайком, незаметно исчезать
潜出闺房 тайком выскользнуть из своей комнатки
3) скрыться, спрятаться; затеряться (напр. в толпе)
潜入地下工作 перейти на нелегальную работу, уйти в подполье
潜渊 скрываться в глубинах
4) погружать (напр. в воду); прятать, скрывать
II прил./наречие
1) подводный; глубокий; под водой, глубоко; глубина
潜石 подводный камень
潜穴 глубокая нора
2) спрятанный, скрытый, тайный; потенциальный, латентный; скрытно, втайне
潜兵 войска в засаде
潜住 скрытно (уединённо) жить
潜势力 потенциальные силы
III сущ.
* рыбий садок
潜有多鱼 много рыбы в садке...
IV собств.
1) ист. геогр. Цянь (река в Центральном Китае)
2) Цянь (фамилия)
Radicals: 氵, 夫, 日  (tsunami, husband, sun)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tsunami carries a husband and his husband up into the sun where they conceal their centaur. The two husbands run a centaur farm, but the local government isn’t too pleased by this so they have to conceal their centaurs in the sun unless they want them to be confiscated by the government.
Imagine the tsunami carrying the husbands and the centaur up into the sun. Hear the water gushing as they conceal the centaur up there. That tsunami is gigantic.
Reading Mnemonic
What is it the husbands are going to conceal? Oh that’s right, a centaur (せん). They are concealing a centaur in the sun. How forgetful of you.
Just make sure to remember there is a centaur up on that tsunami with the husbands. They need to conceal the centaur to keep it safe.
